DOC.brief_title: Effect L-carnitine-containing Peritoneal Dialysis ( PD ) Solution Insulin Sensitivity Patients Continuous Ambulatory Peritoneal Dialysis ( CAPD )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age â‰¥18 year 2 . Have diagnosis ESRD Continuous Ambulatory Peritoneal Dialysis ( CAPD ) least 3 month 3 . Be stable clinical condition four week immediately prior Screening Period demonstrate medical history , physical examination laboratory test 4 . Have blood hemoglobin concentration 8,5 g/100ml ( data verify Investigators ) 5 . Have experience peritonitis episode last 3 month 6 . Be treat Extraneal ( nocturnal exchange bag solution ) least 1 month 7 . Be treat 3 diurnal exchange bag solution ( 1.5 % 2.5 % glucose ) one nocturnal exchange bag solution ( Extraneal ) 8 . Have Kt/V urea measurement > 1.7 per week previous test perform within 6 month confirm Baseline Visit 9 . Have minimum weekly creatinine clearance 45 litres previous test perform within 6 month confirm Baseline Visit 10 . Have D/P Creatinine ratio Peritoneal Equilibration Test ( PET ) 0.50 0.81 previous test perform within 6 month confirm Baseline Visit 11 . Have D/P Glucose ratio Peritoneal Equilibration Test ( PET ) 0.26 0.49 previous test perform within 6 month confirm Baseline Visit 12 . Be treat participate clinical Investigator period least three month 13 . Have understood sign Informed Consent Form . 1 . Have history drug alcohol abuse six month prior enter protocol 2 . Be treatment androgens 3 . Have Diabetes Mellitus ( defined American Diabetes Society , objectively document fast plasma glucose HbA1c determination ) 4 . Have clinically significant abnormal liver function test ( SGOT , SGPT , gammaGT > 2 time upper normal limit ) 5 . Have acute infectious condition ( i.e . : pulmonary infection , acute hepatitis , high low urinary tract infection , renal parenchymal infection , pericarditis , etc ) 6 . Have history congestive heart failure clinically significant arrhythmia 7 . Have history epilepsy NCS disease 8 . Have malignancy within past 5 year , include lymphoproliferative disorder 9 . Have medical condition , judgment Investigator , would jeopardize patient 's safety follow exposure study drug , particularly patient 's life expectancy le 1 year 10 . Have history LCarnitine therapy use month prior enter protocol 11 . Have use investigational drug 3 month prior enter protocol 12 . Be pregnancy , lactation , fertility age without protection pregnancy adequate contraceptive mean
